title: Badlands Music Pack 3
description: A hybrid of western, industrial and electronica-styled seamless looping music perfect for a post apocalyptic/futuristic wasteland.
longDescription:
Third and final in the series, Badlands Music Pack 3 contains music perfect for venturing into any wasteland or combating hordes of space mutants. Included are ambient tracks perfect for exploring and tension tracks designed for combat. The main tracks are broken down into sub loops to give the user a broader spectrum of music. Fading tracks are also included, these are perfect for game trailers and youtube videos. Make sure you check out Badlands Music Pack 1 and Badlands Music Pack 2.


LISTEN

  • The Outer Drift - Full Fade Version
  • The Outer Drift - Ambient Loop Version
  • The Outer Drift - Tension Loop 1
  • The Outer Drift - Tension Loop 2

5. Shady Cantina - Full Loop Version

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 37

Number of Audio Cues: 37

All audio files are .wav 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

Does music loop: (Yes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)


All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Added 2 new music tracks with a total of 9 versions.
